original_text: Like a big mouth, it ate those men, their families and everything that belonged to them. The earth covered Korah, all his group and everything that belonged to them.
korean_text: 땅이 그 입을 열어 그들과 그들의 집과 고라에게 속한 모든 사람과 그들의 재물을 삼키매

sentences.original_text: Like a big mouth, it ate those men
sentences.korean_translation: 큰 입처럼 그것은 그 사람들을 삼켰다

sentences.original_text: and everything that belonged to them
and everything that belonged to them
